name: Winegum
body:
###Winegum
=======

Winegum is a beautiful theme for WordPress. It supports feauteres like custom headers, logo and headline.
You decide on which places want to show a sidebar with widgets.
If you wish you can even place widgets on the footer.

The theme uses Bootstrap as a backbone. So your site will look nice on each device.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
